name: A normal Dungeon
description:
Please play it to the end, so you understand the story (it's pretty short).

This game was created for the Commuinity Game Jam.

Its a dungeon platformer with a short story.

You can download it or play it in the browser.

** Rate the game, if you enjoyed playing. **

Controls:

A, D - move player

Space - jump

Left Mouse / Ctrl - attack, skip dialoges
